name: aBetterOffice
tag_list: office-space, office-rental, office-suites, executive-suites, executive-office-suites, coworking, shared-office, shared-office-space, virtual-office, virtual-offices, commercial-real-estate
overview:
ABetterOffice provides advice and information to mobile professionals, telecommuters and seekers of alternatives to traditional forms of office space.

ABetterOffice focuses on virtual offices, executive office suites, shared office space and the technology behind them.
